title: 7 influential accounts are warping Israel-Hamas news on X, researchers find
description: A handful of influential but unreliable accounts, some of which have been promoted by Elon Musk, are dominating the flow of news on X.

title: U.S. hostages released by Hamas are relatives of former NBC correspondent
description: The Israeli government has confirmed the identities of the two American hostages released by Hamas as Judith and Natalie Raanan. The women are relatives of former NBC News Tel Aviv bureau chief Martin Fletcher.

title: 2 Americans held by Hamas have been released
description: Two U.S. hostages taken custody by Hamas have been released, according to three people with knowledge of the matter.

title: Elon Musk's former trust and safety chief says working at X was ‘the hardest experience’ of her career
description: In an interview with NBC News Ella Irwin discussed why she left, what she thinks of Elon Musk’s leadership and what her next steps might be.

title: Advanced AI chatbots perpetuate racist, debunked medical ideas, researchers find
description: SAN FRANCISCO — As hospitals and health care systems turn to artificial intelligence to help summarize doctors’ notes and analyze health records, a new study led by Stanford School of Medicine researchers cautions that popular chatbots are perpetuating racist, debunked medical ideas, prompting concerns that the tools could worsen health disparities for Black patients.

title: Practical solutions to protect your child from excess screen time
description: NBC’s Jacob Ward joins TODAY to share tips for parents to help their children develop healthy relationships with technology and screens, including phones specifically designed for kids, monitoring apps and more.

title: The impact of screen time on kids: What's at stake
description: A panel of experts join TODAY to discuss the impact of smartphones, social media and screens on the physical and mental health of children and teens. They talk about the current concerns over screen time, the developmental impacts of smartphones and more.

title: Aid trucks wait to cross into Gaza after another night of heavy bombing
description: Aid trucks wait to cross into Gaza after another night of heavy bombing

title: Video shows aftermath of the collapse of Gaza’s oldest church
description: Parts of the Greek Orthodox Church of St. Porphyrios, which was sheltering displaced families, collapsed in an explosion in Gaza.
